Literature.Title: Cloning and localization of MCdef, a defensin from Manila clams (Ruditapes philippinarum).
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol B Biochem Mol Biol. 2012;161:25-31
Literature.Author: Adhya M, Jeung HD, Kang HS, Choi KS, Lee DS, Cho M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>20µM),Mycobacterium fortuitum(MIC=>20µM),Corynebacterium diphtheriae(MIC=>20µM),Streptococcus iniae KCTC 3651(MIC=1.25-2.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1916(MIC=1.25-2.5µM),Aliivibrio logei KCCM 12281(MIC=10-20µM),Aliivibrio salmonicida KCCM 41663(MIC=10-20µM)
